scripts.data:countries:download: mkdir -p raw_data/natural_earth processed frontend/public/data && curl -L https://naciscdn.org/naturalearth/50m/cultural/ne_50m_admin_0_countries.zip -o raw_data/natural_earth/ne_50m_admin_0_countries.zip && unzip -o raw_data/natural_earth/ne_50m_admin_0_countries.zip -d raw_data/natural_earth/
scripts.data:countries:build: pnpm dlx mapshaper raw_data/natural_earth/ne_50m_admin_0_countries.shp -proj wgs84 -each 'name=ADMIN,iso_a3=ADM0_A3,iso_a2=ISO_A2' -filter-fields name,iso_a3,iso_a2 -simplify dp 12% keep-shapes -clean -o format=geojson precision=0.0001 processed/countries_50m.geojson && cp processed/countries_50m.geojson frontend/public/data/countries.geojson
scripts.data:countries: pnpm run data:countries:download && pnpm run data:countries:build
scripts.simplify:adm1: pnpm dlx mapshaper public/data/laos_provinces.geojson -simplify 15% keep-shapes -o format=geojson precision=5 public/data/laos_provinces.geojson && pnpm dlx mapshaper public/data/cambodia_provinces.geojson -simplify 15% keep-shapes -o format=geojson precision=5 public/data/cambodia_provinces.geojson
scripts.fetch:all: pnpm run fetch:adm0 && pnpm run fetch:adm1
